name: 2 DAY CAVING TOUR & RUSTIC CHAY LAP EXPLORE
description: This unique journey is a fantastic way to explore the quite side of Phong Nha – Ke Bang National Park by trekking, kayak, swimming and cycling in the core zone of Phong Nha - Ke Bang National Park, then explore rustic life which is in a small village of Chay Lap and experience the difference of homestay, one of the best homestay in Vietnam, a truly tranquil hideaway and enjoy Vietnamese farming life to be served family-style meals.
